Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 6 lines of text on one side containing a letter.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of St Phoibammon, Location of the Temple of Mentuhotep I.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (201-203, pl.23)
Naville 1907-1913 / The XIth Dynasty Temple at Deir el-Bahari (3:20) (H R Hall ed.)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82887) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82887)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 21 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
